long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep WhatsApp web always open on the side of your browser,
no need to switch back and fourth between tabs.

Interface is optimized for small screen.
Unread message count will appear on the icon

Disclaimer
This extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by WhatsApp™ or Meta™.
Extension does not collect any data from users.

Changelog:
fixed color scheme for back button
fixed ui responsive transform
updated icon counter
